infoText: [c]Welcome Back to the lands of Middle-earth!
ยง5Update v0.9.4-beta is now live! New additions, some changes, and all to make the experience even better than before!
Main menu has had a little bit of a face lift, also main quest line is going strong with first chapter nearing completion!  This means a download of the map very soon!
I have also added a new button to the main menu, it is the default keyboard layout should you ever need it or change it.
